reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Coordination and Technical Assistance Fund - Sudan

description.narrative: Financing a coordination fund to ensure the hiring of 3 professionals for the Office in Khartoum

Finanziamento di un fondo di coordinamento che assicuri - attraverso tre (3) figure professionali a complemento del personale della sede AICS Khartoum - la necessaria assistenza tecnica, valutazione, coordinamento, coaching, gestione, procurement, amministrazione e monitoraggio ai progetti finanziati dalla Cooperazione Italiana in Sudan e nei paesi di competenza, nonché una maggiore partecipazione ai tavoli di coordinamento con partner internazionali, dell’UE, del sistema Onusiano e delle OSC assicurando la complementarità e sinergia con gli altri Partner di Sviluppo.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

Enhance international support for implementing effective and targeted capacity-building in developing countries to support national plans to implement all the Sustainable Development Goals, including through North-South, South-South and triangular cooperation
Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
